name: Stray Impulse
description:
What the heck?! A plane in space?! And it shoots lasers?! Become the one and only in Stray Impulse. Fly around and shoot EVERYTHING.

Controls: It is "WASD" to move and "Spacebar / Left Click" to fire laser.

This game was made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 39 game jam with the theme "Running out of power". The game has now gone through a few development stages since.

Features:

  • LASERS
  • Killer Missles
  • Endless Survival
  • Online Highscores

NOTICE:

Game may contain bugs/exploits throughout the game. Please leave a comment on what the bug/exploit is. It will help a ton.

People Involved: 

  • Tyranosaw (https://twitter.com/Tyranosaw)
  • Zuezazon (https://twitter.com/Zuezazon)

Tools Used: Unity 2017.1 (C#), Piskel, BFXR

Ludum Dare Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/stray-impulse
